      private static <T> void QuickSelect.insertionSort​(T data, QuickSelect.Adapter<T> adapter, int start, int end)

      static <T> void QuickSelect.quickSelect​(T data, QuickSelect.Adapter<T> adapter, int start, int end, int rank)
      QuickSelect is essentially quicksort, except that we only "sort" that half of the array that we are interested in.
